metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22817 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: PIL.ImageMath.eval in Pillow before 9.0.0 allows evaluation of arbitrary expressions, such as ones that use the Python exec method. A lambda expression could also be used,

notes.Note: ccdm94> upstream mentions in the readthedocs page for version 9.0.1 (https://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/stable/releasenotes/9.0.1.html) that the fix for this CVE applied in version 9.0.0 (commit 8531b01d6c) does not completely patch the vulnerability. A new commit, dd46100bdc, was added in order to completely fix the issue. mdeslaur> switching releases back to needed due to incomplete fix

criterions.comment: pillow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
